Package database

Class AppointmentDAO

Object
AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) responsible for managing appointment data. Handles reading and writing of appointment-related data from/to a CSV file.
Since:
2024-11-06
Version:
1.2
Author:
Chin Linn Sheng

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentDAO

      public AppointmentDAO()
      Constructor for the AppointmentDAO class.

  • Method Details

    • readAppointmentData

      public static void readAppointmentData()
      Reads the appointment data from the CSV file and processes it. Creates appointment objects, associates them with patients and doctors, and updates the relevant data.

    • createAppointment

      private static Appointment createAppointment(List<String> inputData, AppointmentStatus appointmentStatus)
      Creates an Appointment object based on the input data.
      Parameters:
      inputData - the data parsed from the CSV line
      appointmentStatus - the status of the appointment
      Returns:
      a newly created Appointment object

    • createAppointmentOutcome

      private static AppointmentOutcome createAppointmentOutcome(List<String> inputData, Appointment appointment)
      Creates an AppointmentOutcome object based on the input data.
      Parameters:
      inputData - the data parsed from the CSV line
      appointment - the appointment for which the outcome is being created
      Returns:
      a newly created AppointmentOutcome object

    • updatePatientAndDoctorData

      private static void updatePatientAndDoctorData(Appointment appointment, AppointmentOutcome appointmentOutcome)
      Updates the data of the patient and doctor based on the appointment outcome.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment whose data is being updated
      appointmentOutcome - the outcome of the appointment

    • updateAppointmentData

      private static void updateAppointmentData(Appointment appointment, AppointmentStatus appointmentStatus)
      Updates the appointment data based on the appointment status.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment whose data is being updated
      appointmentStatus - the status of the appointment (e.g., PENDING, CONFIRM)

    • writeAppointmentData

      public static void writeAppointmentData()
      Writes appointment data to the CSV file. It iterates over all patients' appointments and writes their details into the file.

    • formatAppointmentCSVLine

      private static String formatAppointmentCSVLine(Appointment appointment, AppointmentOutcome outcome)
      Formats the appointment data into a CSV line.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to format
      outcome - the appointment outcome to format
      Returns:
      a string representing the appointment in CSV format
